channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: Idk what I did im not affiliated with Java... I was trying to figure out what was wrong with my rsc Client why I would have a dc problem every day during the afternoon so I looked into Programs Found I had 3 different Javas figured they were competing.. So I deleted all of them and Googled Java Enviorement install.. Installed Java 7 u40 (the newest you can see it if you google Java Download and go to jave website) and i could get onto the server.. I turned off my laptop while I went to store came back and turned it back on.. Now I Get 'Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. How do I fix this, Ive uninstalled it and re installed so many times and still no change please Help

item.title: Help Please

Idk what I did im not affiliated with Java… I was trying to figure out what was wrong with my rsc Client why I would have a dc problem every day during the afternoon so I looked into Programs Found I had 3 different Javas figured they were competing… So I deleted all of them and Googled Java Enviorement install… Installed Java 7 u40 (the newest you can see it if you google Java Download and go to jave website) and i could get onto the server… I turned off my laptop while I went to store came back and turned it back on… Now I Get ‘Java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. How do I fix this, Ive uninstalled it and re installed so many times and still no change please Help
